---
title: "Relationship between Number of Threads and execution Time"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  word_document: default
  html_document: default
---

```{r echo=FALSE}
mat1<-c(29.000000,29.000000,30.000000,28.000000,31.000000)
mat2<-c(17.000000,18.000000,16.000000,16.000000,17.000000)
mat4<-c(10.000000,13.000000,9.000000,8.000000,12.000000)
mat8<-c(7.000000,5.000000,5.000000,9.000000,5.000000)
mat16<-c(4.000000,6.000000,4.000000,4.000000,4.000000)
mat32<-c(2.000000,2.000000,3.000000,2.000000,2.000000)
mat64<-c(2.000000,2.000000,2.000000,1.000000,2.000000)
mat128<-c(1.000000,2.000000,2.000000,1.000000,2.000000)

times<-c(mean(mat1),mean(mat2),mean(mat4), mean(mat8), mean(mat16), mean(mat32), mean(mat64), mean(mat128))

plot(c(1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128), times,
     main="Relationship between Wall Clock Time and Number of Threads",
     xlab = "Number of Threads",
     ylab = "Time (Seconds)")
par(mar=c(0,0,35,0))
```


```{r echo=FALSE}
plot(c(1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128), rep(1,times = 8)/times,
     main = "Relationship between Performance time and Number of Threads",
     xlab = "Number of Threads",
     ylab = "Performance (Hertz)")
```
